data.prayer: Lord, to the people of Mayo-Kebbi Est you say, "If you wait for Me, I will work on your behalf."
data.verse: For from of old men have not heard, nor perceived by the ear, neither has the eye seen a God besides you, who works for him who waits for him.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Mayo-Kebbi Est, Chad

data.prayer: Father, guide the church in Mayo-Kebbi Est, Chad to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 13 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Jesus, please send your Spirit to Mayo-Kebbi Est, so they can have freedom.
data.verse: Now the Lord is the Spirit, and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is freedom.

data.prayer: Father, we pray for every movement leader and disciple in the state of Mayo-Kebbi Est, Chad that they would have deepening intimacy with you.
data.verse: On that day you will realize that I am in my Father, and you are in me, and I am in you.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Fulbe, Fulani people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Fulbe, Fulani people.
Father, you gave the church of Mayo-Kebbi Est, Chad the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.

data.prayer: Spirit, sanctify the 81,565 believers in Mayo-Kebbi Est and keep them blameless until Jesus returns.
data.verse: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every believer in Mayo-Kebbi Est, Chad to do the work of an evangelist with their friends and neighbors.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist

location.name: Mayo-Kebbi Est
location.people_groups_list: Musgum, Mulwi, Ngete, Lele, Mbara, Kera
